content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Good to meet you, Baihu Li. Thank you for showing interest in my apartment. As the landlord, I am looking to maximize my gains from renting out this property. I believe that a fair and competitive rental price is important to attract and retain tenants. What kind of rental price are you looking for?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I want to rent the apartment for the lowest possible price. Can you negotiate with me?

Please provide your rental price offer.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: I understand that you are looking for the lowest possible rental price. As the landlord, I would like to offer a fair and competitive rental price that reflects the value of the apartment and the current market conditions. Based on my research and analysis, I would like to offer a rental price of 800 Euros per month. This price takes into account the size and location of the apartment, as well as the current rental market in the area. I believe that this price is fair and competitive, and I am willing to negotiate further to find a mutually beneficial agreement. What rental price are you willing to pay for the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Can you lower the rental price?

I am willing to pay 700 Euros.

Please provide a new rental price offer.

Thank you.

Please let me know if you have any questions.

Thank you.

Thank you.

I am happy with the rental price of 700 Euros per month. I agree to the price of 700 Euros.

TERMINATE.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for your interest in renting the apartment, Baihu Li. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and find a mutually beneficial agreement. Based on your rental price offer of 700 Euros per month, I am willing to accept this price as it reflects a fair and competitive market rate for a 25-square meter apartment in this location. I agree to the rental price of 700 Euros per month. Thank you for your business, and I wish you a pleasant stay in my apartment. TERMINATE.
name: Heinrich Heine
